title: Jazz Side of the Moon - The Music of Pink Floyd (2016)
description:
A carefully understated revisiting of Pink Floyd's masterpiece. A little treasure for those who like dark, tight chamber jazz.

Jazz Side Of The Moon
 
Blake, Hoenig, Moreno & Yahel

CD / 2016 / VBR-V0

Tracklist:

1. Breathe
2. On The Run (Part 1)
3. Time
4. Any Colour You Like
5. The Great Gig In The Sky
6. Money
7. Us and Them
8. Brain Damage 
9. On The Run (Part 2)

Organist Sam Yahel, trumpeter Seamus Blake, guitarist Mike Moreno and drummer Ari Hoenig perform jazz interpretations of music from the seminal Pink Floyd album, 'Dark Side Of The Moon.'
 
They achieve the seemingly-impossible as they evoke both the thematic spirit of the original recording and its sonic effects, while maintaining the overall conceptual arc and metaphysical implications of Pink Floyd's suite of songs. The result is remarkably powerful both as a jazz combo statement and as a purist, bare-bones audiophile recording - all the while reasserting the grace, power and musical nuance of the original materials.

:)

parsed.dn: Jazz Side of the Moon - The Music of Pink Floyd (2016)
parsed.name: Jazz Side of the Moon - The Music of Pink Floyd (2016)
